usage.en: Apply generously to face and body before exposure. Renew frequently
usage.ar: يوضع بوفره على الوجه والجسم قبل التعرض لاشعة الشمس

description.ar: مضاد قوي للاكسده ولبشره اكثر اشراقا ومضاد للتصبغات ( اعلى تركيز فيتامين سي 25% ) مناسب للبشره الحساسه يحتوي على نوعين من الفيتامين سي

ingredients.spotlight:
•      ULTRA-HIGH CONCENTRATION: 25% of a stabilised vitamin C complex
•      Certified non-photoallergenic, non-phototoxic and non-photosensitising
•     Can be used for Sensitive Skin

usage.en: Take one or two dabs then distribute the Vitamin C Booster over the entire face and targeted areas (pigment spots and wrinkles).
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه من مره الى مرتين يوميا للوجه

description.ar: كريم ليلي يحتوي على فيتامين سي للحصول على بشره ناعمه ومشرقه ويقلل من التصبغات الموجوده

ingredients.spotlight: •      A “NEW SKIN” effect thanks to a trio of gentle peeling active ingredients: gluconolactone, lactic acid and a complex of lactic acid and arginine. These active ingredients are released throughout the night for continued action

usage.en: Apply to the face, avoiding the eye area, lips and sides of the nose.
usage.ar: يوضع على الوجه ليلا مع تجنب وضعه على منطقة حول العينين والشفاه و حواف الانف

name: HA Serum Booster 3.2%

en: An exceptional concentration of HA (3.2% pure
4 sizes of AH for complementary actions within the skin.
A prebiotic of natural origin with the astonishing ability to stimulate your own synthesis of Hyaluronic Acid.
description.ar: مضاد للتجاعيد ومرطب قوي ويحافظ على قوام البشره وحجمها ( اعلى تركيز من حامض الهايالورينك ) العبوه كامله تعادل 40 ابرة فيلر. يحتوي على 4 انواع من حامض الهايالورينك تغطي جميع طبقات البشره.

benefits: The Booster Serum has established itself as one of the indisputable references in anti-aging care with Hyaluronic Acid.

ingredients.spotlight:
•      hyaluronic acid is, rightly, an anti-aging star.

Within the skin, this 100% natural active ingredient plays two main roles:
1/ MOISTURIZING: it prevents dehydration by forming a gel with water.
2/ ANTI-AGING: it ensures plump skin and stimulates collagen.

usage.en:
•      Apply a few drops every day to the entire face and neck. The Booster Serum can be used alone or just before your usual cream. You don't need to wait between applying this serum and applying your makeup.
•      Indicative quantity of serum to apply:
Combination skin: 1 to 2 drops.
Normal skin: 2 to 3 drops.
Dry skin: 3 drops and more.
usage.ar: يوضع من نقطه الى نقطتين للبشره المختلطه ومن نقطتين الى 3 نقط للبشره العاديه ومن 3 نقط او اكثر للبشره الجافه على كامل الوجه والرقبه

name: Expert Anti Aging Cream

description.en: slows down skin aging thanks to an exclusive patented active ingredient, Novaxilyne, which activates the youth gene. This epigenetic feat helps reduce the depth of wrinkles by up to 37%* in a few weeks
description.ar: كريم عميق ومضاد لجميع انواع التجاعيد للبشره الجافه

benefits: Powerful ANTI-AGING thanks to a patented active ingredient: Novaxyline which increases by 20%* the expression of sirtuins, nicknamed the “youth proteins”. Skin cells become 11 years younger

ingredients.spotlight: •      In this formula 3 types of collagen (III, IV & VII) are stimulated thanks to a brown algae extract

usage.en: •      Apply in small touches over the entire face and massage in using upward circular massages. A small amount of product is sufficient.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه على الوجه مع تدليك بحركه دائريه للاعلى

name: Expert Anti Aging Fluid

description.en: slows down skin aging thanks to an exclusive patented active ingredient, Novaxilyne, which activates the youth gene. This epigenetic feat helps reduce the depth of wrinkles by up to 37%* in a few weeks
description.ar: كريم عميق ومضاد لجميع انواع التجاعيد للبشره العاديه والمختلطه

benefits: Powerful ANTI-AGING thanks to a patented active ingredient: Novaxyline which increases by 20%* the expression of sirtuins, nicknamed the “youth proteins”. Skin cells become 11 years younger

ingredients.spotlight: •      In this formula 3 types of collagen (III, IV & VII) are stimulated thanks to a brown algae extract

usage.en: •      Apply in small touches over the entire face and massage in using upward circular massages. A small amount of product is sufficient.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه على الوجه مع تدليك بحركه دائريه للاعلى

name: LipUp

description.en: A volumizing, anti-wrinkle and nourishing treatment.
description.ar: لترطيب وتحجيم وتحديد وتغذية ولمعان الشفاه ( اللون الوردي الطبيعي للشفاه ) وضد التشققات ومضاد للتجاعيد

benefits: 3-in-1 AESTHETIC treatment: +10.6% volume*, a natural gloss effect* for 92% of women and a redefined lip contour* for 88% of them.
2-in-1 COSMETIC treatment: smoothing treatment with -23.6% microgrooves* and 21.3% more even lip color*.
2-in-1 DERMATOLOGICAL treatment: +38.2% intense nutrition* for guaranteed anti-chapping action and repaired lips* for 96% of users.

ingredients.spotlight: •      The performance of Lip'Up for volume gain is explained in particular by the use of a plant extract nicknamed in Brazil natural Viagra®!

usage.en:
•     Apply to the lips. If you want to combine Lip'Up with your lipstick, 2 options are possible:
1/ MATTE effect: apply the Lip'Up, leave to act for 15 min then apply your lipstick.
2/ GLOSSY effect: Apply your lipstick followed immediately by Lip'Up.
usage.ar: يوضع عدة مرات على الشفاه ويمكن وضعه قبل احمر الشفاه ب 15 دقيقه او بعد احمر الشفاه مباشره

name: Expert Antiaging Eye Contour

description.en: A 3-in-1 eye contour: anti-wrinkle, anti-puffiness & anti-dark circles,
description.ar: مضاد للتجاعيد والهالات السوداء والانتفاخات لمنطقة ما حول العينين

benefits: ANTI-WRINKLES: up to 50% fewer wrinkles around the eye in 21 days*
ANTI-DARK CIRCLES & ANTI-POCKETS: 95% of users find their dark circles less visible and their bags reduced in 21 days

ingredients.spotlight: •       ANTI-AGING active ingredients such as Novaxyline, a patented active ingredient acting on youth proteins, hyaluronic acid or even an anti-aging amino acid. -wrinkles. Alongside them, TENSIFYING active ingredients acting on BLOOD CIRCULATION to limit dark circles and puffiness: algae extracts, coffee extracts, ferments, etc.

usage.en: After cleansing and before using a serum or cream, apply Expert Anti-Aging Eye Contour to the lower eyelid, starting from the inner corner of the eye towards the end of the wrinkles on the paw. goose. A small amount of product is sufficient.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه لمنطقة ما حول العينين من مره الى مرتين يوميا

description.en: To instantly illuminate and lift your eye contour. A localized treatment that acts on the surface as well as in depth to smooth the lines
description.ar: لمنطقة ما حول العينين اقل تعبا واكثراشراقا بشكل فوري

main: high molecular weight hyaluronic acid or baobab pulp
ingredients.spotlight:
•      INSTANT LIFTING action: thanks to 5 ingredients with immediate effect including high molecular weight hyaluronic acid or baobab pulp
•      DEEP ANTI-AGING action: thanks to 5 anti-aging components including Novaxyline,
•     RADIANCE OF THE EYES action: thanks to the unique combination of hyaluronic acid, which fills skin microdepressions, and a vitamin C complex for a brighter look.

usage.en:
•   Gently apply a small amount of product to the lower eyelid, starting from the inner corner of the eye towards the end of the crow's feet wrinkles.
Apply makeup immediately so as not to remove the tensor film.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه لمنطقة ما حول العينين من مره الى مرتين يوميا

name: Express Radiant Cleansing Foam

en: a single gesture is enough for three actions: cleansing, removing make-up and exfoliating. Daily care for a new skin effect and a brighter complexion.
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: مقشرلطيف وغسول رغوي لبشره ناعمه ونظيفه ومشرقه ( غسول ألأضاءه )

benefits: Clear, smooth skin in 20 seconds flat! And here’s how the Flash Radiance Cleansing Foam works:

ingredients.spotlight:
•      Peel off dead skin. ENZYMATIC PEEL: dissociate dead skin from its residual attachments with papaya enzymes.

•      Remove dead skin. ORGANIC PEEL: sweep away dead skin using exfoliating PHAs.
•     No Preservatives

usage.en: •   Apply the Flash Radiance Cleansing Foam to a damp face, leave on for 20 seconds then massage for 10 seconds, rinse and dry.
usage.ar: يوضع على الوجه الرطب ويترك 20 ثانيه ويدللك 10 ثواني ومن ثم يغسل ويجفف

name: Expert Exfoliator

description.en: 2-in-1 product that is both a peeling mask and a scrub that leaves your skin smooth and clear from the first application
description.ar: مقشر خاص لتنعيم البشره لبشره اكثر اشراقا ويمكن استخدامه كقناع لمدة 5 دقائق ومن ثم يدلك ويغسل

benefits: A MASK for a radiant complexion: in just a few minutes, the Expert Exfoliant illuminates the complexion
A SCRUB for smoothed skin: this time, it's mechanical peeling that comes into action

ingredients.spotlight:
•      biological peeling provided by gluconolactone (PHA) combined with vitamin C. During this first stage, dead cells are separated from the epidermis.
•      exfoliating jojoba microspheres, polishing bamboo silica and exfoliating apricot kernel powder. Dead cells are then removed and the epidermis smoothed

usage.en: •   STEP 1: apply the Exfoliant like a mask to the face, avoiding the eye and lip area. Leave on for 5 minutes. STEP 2: massage very gently with damp hands for 1 minute. Rinse with cold water and pat dry..
usage.ar: يمكن وضعه كقناع لمدة 5 دقائق على الوجه مع تجنب منطقة العينين والشفاه ومن ثم يغسل ويمكن وضعه على اليد الرطبه وعمل مساج للوجه لمدة دقيقه ومن ثم يغسل بماء بارد ويجفف

en: "anti-stress" formula. Hydro-Biotic Gentle Cream reduces the molecules that cause skin sensitivity by about 30%.
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: كريم خاص للبشره الحساسسه والتي تعاني من الاحمرار و الأكزيما ويعمل على التقليل من تهيج البشره وتلطيفها ويحتوي على البروبايوتيك والبريبيوتيك للمحافظه على البكيريا النافعه وبالتالي يرفع من مناعة البشره

ingredients.spotlight: •      Magnesium is recognized for its relaxing and anti-stress properties

usage.en:
•   Apply in small touches over the entire face and massage in using upward circular massages. A small amount of product is sufficient.

Before applying makeup, leave to penetrate for 5 minutes.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه على الوجه مع تدليك بحركه دائريه للاعلى ويوضع قبل المكياج ب 5 دقائق

description.en: The Magnesium Mist concentrates in its droplets the benefits of Magnesium salt from the Dead Sea. It combines a high concentration of natural magnesium and ultra-pure water. A soothing and protective spray for instant hydration
description.ar: بخاخ حاص يحتوي على المغنيسيوم لترطيب  وتلطيف البشره المتهيجه وحمايتها من عوامل التلوث ومضاد للاكسده يستخدم لجميع الاعمار للرجال والنساء. يستخدم بعد الحلاقه والتعرض لأشعة الشمس ويمكن استحامه ك  TONER ومثبت للمكياج ويستخدم للبشره المتحسسه وحالات الأكزيما واحمرار الوجه

ingredients.spotlight: •      The performance of the Magnesium Mist offers hydration increased by 71%*, oxidation reduced by 40%* and inflammation immediately reduced by 27%*. This mist is a real 360° SOS treatment for sensitive skin.

usage.en:
•   Hold 30 cm from the face, close your eyes and spray 2 or 3 times to cover the entire face.
Leave on for 15 seconds and dry. Also use after removing makeup, cleansing, before treatment or even after makeup in the morning or during the day.
usage.ar: بعد اغماض العينين يتم رشه من 2 الى 3 مرات على الوجه كاملا ويترك 15 ثانيه ليجف ويمكن وضعه قبل او بعد المكياج

en: A cleanser with a velvety, milky texture. A real treatment that preserves your good bacteria. Containing Omegas, Magnesium, Pre and Post-biotics, its softness and soothing power are ideal for sensitive skin
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: غسول علاجي للبشره المتحسسه والمتهيجه والفاقده للرطوبه والدهون والبشره التي تعاني من الاكزيما او الصدفيه ويترك البشره رطبه مع المحافظه على البكتيريا النافعه في البشره

ingredients.spotlight:
•      omega 6 & 9 to nourish the epidermis.
 prebiotics & postbiotics to protect the flora.
 magnesium to soothe skin nerves and reduce the symptoms of sensitive skin

usage.en:
• JAPANESE METHOD: Apply with fingertips, massage and rinse with lukewarm or cold water.

EUROPEAN METHOD: Apply using a cotton pad or, more environmentally friendly, a reusable wipe and remove everything with the cotton pad or wipe.

Then spray the Magnesium Mist.
usage.ar: يمكن وضعه على اطراف الاصابع وعمل تدليك للوجه ومن ثم يغسل بماء بارد ويمكن وضعه باستخدام القطن وتنظيف الوجه

en: This 2-in-1 treatment incorporates anti-imperfection innovations and active ingredients to fight against the first signs of aging. A true pillar of the Trio-Zinc range, it can be used daily to achieve clear, mattified skin.
NORMAL TO OILY SKIN, WITH OR WITHOUT IMPERFECTIONS.
description.ar: جل علاجي مخصوص لتنقية البشره الدهنيه والمعرضه لحب الشباب ويقلل من لمعانها

ingredients.spotlight:
• Thanks to the three forms of Zinc integrated into this treatment, the activity of a pro-acne factor (released in the event of a too sugary diet in particular) is radically reduced, offering you the chance to find clear skin,
•      Three actions to act at the origin of imperfections: reduction of sebum production*, soothing effect* and inhibition of the bacteria responsible for spots*.

usage.en: •   Apply in small touches over the entire face and massage in using upward circular massages. A small amount of product is sufficient. Before applying makeup, leave to penetrate for 5 minutes
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه على الوجه مع تدليك بحركه دائريه للاعلى ويوضع قبل المكياج ب 5 دقائق

en: A localized treatment, effective from the first sensations of pain or redness. With its precise packaging, it allows clear and rapid resorption of blackheads. Discreet, practical and effective, it acts as much on the color of the pimple as on its relief for rapid and clear absorption
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: منتج مخصوص لمعالجة البثور ويعمل عل تجفيفها وتقليلها ويمنع رجوعها يوضع على الحبوب 3 مرات يوميا لمدة 5 ايام ويمكن وضعه على موضع الألم والأحمرار قبل ظهور الحبه كوقايه.

ingredients.spotlight:
•      Zinc is the essential trace element for all oily skin with or without imperfections:

ANTI-BACTERIAL: it helps eliminate the bacteria causing pimples, C.acnes.

ANTI-INFLAMMATORY: it reduces the severity of imperfections.

ANTIOXIDANT: it protects sebum lipids from oxidation, a factor that aggravates imperfections.

usage.en: •  FOR PREVENTION: at the first sensation of pain or the beginning of redness (prior to a pimple). FIXED: if the button is already visible. Stop Bouton Express is always applied to bare skin. Leave at least 10 minutes before applying your cream or makeup.
usage.ar: يوضع على الحبوب 3 مرات يوميا لمدة 5 ايام ويمكن وضعه على موضع الألم والأحمرار قبل ظهور الحبه كوقايه.

en: This anti-blemish cleanser differs radically in its composition, notably thanks to its ultra-gentle foaming agent which purifies without stripping and cleanses without drying
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: غسول جل رغوي لتنقية البشره الدهنيه والبشره المعرضه لحب الشباب

ingredients.spotlight: •      Clinically proven effectiveness while excluding the aggressive and controversial ingredients found in the majority of anti-acne cleansers: 0% alcohol, 0% SLS/SLES and 0% glycolic acid/salicylic acid!

usage.en: •   Apply to damp face, massage and rinse
usage.ar: يوضع على الوجه الرطب ويدلك ويغسل

name: Booster Serum Polyphenols

en: A serum that acts to prevent and correct all types of spots. It is effective on spots caused by external factors (sun, pollution) thanks to powerful antioxidants but also on those due to internal factors such as stress or skin sensitivity.
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: سيروم مركز من خلاصة الشاي الاخضر كمضاد قوي لجميع انواع التصبغات والبقع الداكنه ومضاد فوي للأكسده ومضاد للتجاعيد ومضاد قوي للبشره الباهته للحصول على بشره مشرقه وذات نضاره

benefits: A serum that reduces spots in less than 2 months, whereas they take several years to form!

It also contains an active ingredient that stimulates the protein responsible for the absence of spots on the palms of the hands. Using what the skin knows how to do by itself to reduce spots, nothing more natural!

ingredients.spotlight: •     Thanks to polyphenols. These small molecules act in the shadows to limit inflammation and oxidation within your skin

usage.en: •   Apply this serum to the face and neck ALONE or BEFORE your cream.
usage.ar: يوضع على الوجه والرقبه لوحده او قبل الكريم الخاص بك

en: With its innovative brush applicator, the Targeted Spot Correcting Treatment works to reduce all pigment spots (lentigo, melasma, hyperpigmentations, etc.)
Result? Up to 84%* lightening of spots in 28 days.
description.ar: فرشاه خاصه من خلاصة الشاي الأخضر لتصحيح وعلاج ومنع التصبغات والبقع الداكنه

ingredients.spotlight:
•       corrects stains:

- by eliminating hyperpigmented keratinocytes through stimulation of cell renewal. Keratinocytes filled with melanin give way to new, less pigmented ones.

- by limiting melanogenesis through a triple action: direct limitation of the creative process, reduction of factors stimulating melanogenesis and reduction of the transfer of melanin to keratinocytes. As a result, the production of brown pigment is reduced by 80% thanks to the selected active ingredients.

usage.en: • Apply to spots 1 to 2 times a day on bare skin. Wait about 10 minutes before applying cream or makeup afterwards.
usage.ar: يوضع على البقع الداكنه من مره الى مرتين يوميا والانتظار 10 دقائق قبل وضع الكريم الخاص بك او المكياج

en: A hybrid formula with a delicious fragrance that inaugurates a new generation of cosmetics. In terms of makeup, healthy glow and flawless complexion. On the skincare side, a concentrate of anti-aging active ingredients for visibly smoothed skin. A single product, a single gesture, for a double “make-up-care” effect
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: كريم خاص للحصول على بشره براقه و لون برونزي طبيعي ومكياج فاتح اللون لأخفاء عيوب البشره

ingredients.spotlight: •      At Novexpert, to benefit from the benefits of melanin, without going overboard, we have developed a hybrid treatment, between makeup and cream in order to enjoy a tanned complexion and a prolonged tan thanks to a 100% natural product. natural origin.

usage.en: •   Apply in small touches in the morning to the entire face, starting from the midline and moving up towards the temples. Smooth the forehead, from the frown line outwards.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه صباحا

en: A hybrid formula with a delicious fragrance that inaugurates a new generation of cosmetics. In terms of makeup, healthy glow and flawless complexion. On the skincare side, a concentrate of anti-aging active ingredients for visibly smoothed skin. A single product, a single gesture, for a double “make-up-care” effect
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: كريم خاص للحصول على بشره براقه و لون برونزي طبيعي ومكياج متوسط اللون لأخفاء عيوب البشره

ingredients.spotlight: •      At Novexpert, to benefit from the benefits of melanin, without going overboard, we have developed a hybrid treatment, between makeup and cream in order to enjoy a tanned complexion and a prolonged tan thanks to a 100% natural product. natural origin.

usage.en: •   Apply in small touches in the morning to the entire face, starting from the midline and moving up towards the temples. Smooth the forehead, from the frown line outwards.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيطه منه صباحا

name: Pro Collagen Booster Serum

en: Novexpert revolutionizes anti-aging by stimulating collagen in the dermis AND epidermis. The precious Collagen 17 is stimulated: +130%* thanks to a patented active ingredient, created by Doctors Novexpert, Novaxyline
adds lasting radiance to the face
description.ar: سيروم معزز لمكافحة شيخوخة البشره ومضاد لجميع انواع التجاعيد العميقه والسطحيه والتعبيريه حيث انه يقوم على تحفيز جين الشباب( كولاجين 17) ويقوم على تنعيم البشره ويعمل على شد البشره ومنع ترهلها ويضيف الى البشره رونقا ونضاره

benefits: AT TISSUE LEVEL: Increase in collagens in the first and second layers of the skin to reduce deep wrinkles.
AT THE CELLULAR LEVEL: Rejuvenated epidermis thanks to the stimulation and organization of cell renewal. Result? Thickened epidermis up to +26%*.

ingredients.spotlight: •     It is the first cosmetic and dermatological treatment to ensure the protection and neo-synthesis of the main dermal AND epidermal collagens, including the famous collagen 17.

usage.en: •   Take a dab or two then distribute the Pro-Collagen Booster over the entire face and neck. This Booster can be applied alone or before your cream. You can apply makeup directly after applying the Booster.
usage.ar: يوضع كميه بسيط منه على الوجه والرقبه لوحده او قبل الكريم الخاص بك ويمكن وضع المكياج بعده مباشرة

description.en: This micellar water alone combines the effectiveness of a cleanser and a leave-in make-up remover with the performance of a moisturizing and revitalizing treatment full of Hyaluronic Acid. A 4 in 1 treatment
description.ar: ماء تنظيف الوجه والعيون من المكياج يحتوي على حامض الهايالورينك لترطيب واعادة الحيويه للبشره

ingredients.spotlight: •      A formula full of hyaluronic acid for immediate hydration and a wrinkle-filling effect. Ultra soft, micellar water is also leave-in, to take care of the most sensitive skin.

usage.en: •  Pour a few drops of Micellar Water with Hyaluronic Acid onto a cotton pad. Apply to the face from the inside out to remove makeup and cleanse.
usage.ar: يتم وضع عدة قطرات منه على قطن لازالة المكياج
